title: How to Enjoy Cleaning Your Homes Office

steps.headline: Start out by having a family member or friend, who will not be helping you, write down what you need to clean.
steps.description: Sometimes we find ourselves overlooking a lot of problems, because we don't want to spend the time to fix it.

steps.headline: Turn on some of your favorite music!
steps.description: This way, you'll be able to dance while you clean.

steps.headline: Get a sibling involved!
steps.description: Tell them that you will be playing a game. One of you will count to 30, with their eyes closed, while the other cleans as much as possible. Then, you switch.

steps.headline: Once you become bored with this game, or you think you have finished cleaning, check the list.
steps.description: Check off what is done, and, if anything isn't done, see who can clean the most items, while dancing.

steps.headline: Now, all the trash and clutter is gone.
steps.description: Phew! Take a break, watch a short show, eat a snack, and relax.

steps.headline: Now, break out the duster, soap, and sponge!
steps.description: Scrub the desk, and any other furniture, to make sure there are no sticky messes, and dust everything else.

steps.headline: Sweep, and mop, the floor until it's shiny.
steps.description: Slide across it a few times in your socks, to make sure there's no leftover dust.

steps.headline: Now, you're done, and the room is fabulous!

text: Start out by having a family member or friend, who will not be helping you, write down what you need to clean. Sometimes we find ourselves overlooking a lot of problems, because we don't want to spend the time to fix it. Turn on some of your favorite music! This way, you'll be able to dance while you clean. Get a sibling involved! Tell them that you will be playing a game. One of you will count to 30, with their eyes closed, while the other cleans as much as possible. Then, you switch. Once you become bored with this game, or you think you have finished cleaning, check the list. Check off what is done, and, if anything isn't done, see who can clean the most items, while dancing. Now, all the trash and clutter is gone. Phew! Take a break, watch a short show, eat a snack, and relax. Now, break out the duster, soap, and sponge! Scrub the desk, and any other furniture, to make sure there are no sticky messes, and dust everything else. Sweep, and mop, the floor until it's shiny. Slide across it a few times in your socks, to make sure there's no leftover dust. Now, you're done, and the room is fabulous! Good Job!
